name: how to make robin
description:
it can open on pc

totally 5 ends, very easy game. and draw these small animation is really interesting.

I start early, but I am a real procratinators.

actually, I pick my favourite for each scene. But because it seems they cant be used for public distribution so I change to some free music(sad).

there are two song I want to share with others:

when a girl by carys( for the power end)
